name: Landroid
0:
”Alexa, open landroid and start cutting the grass”
”Alexa, ask landroid the charging status”
”Alexa, open landroid and ask it to go to the charging station”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: landroid
des:
Control your Landroid using voice commands!

With this skill you can:
• Start it
• Stop cutting
• Find out about the status
• Find out about the battery level
• Send it back to its base

This skill is compatible with all Landroid models.

This is how the Landroid skill for Amazon Alexa works:
Start the skill by saying “Alexa, start Landroid”. Alexa will tell you all of the commands that you can give to your device. 

You can also send direct voice commands to Landroid by starting the skill and immediately giving a command. For example: “Alexa, ask Landroid to cut the lawn.” 

You can find a list of available commands below:
• “Alexa, start Landroid”
• “Alexa, ask Landroid to cut the lawn”
• “Alexa, ask Landroid to take a break”
• “Alexa, ask Landroid what it’s doing”
• “Alexa, ask Landroid what its charging status is”

Please note: 
You will need a Landroid model with Wi-Fi, Find My Landroid, or Radio Link. It must have been made in or after 2016, have up-to-date firmware and be registered with the Landroid app.
